ChromoDoro? Chrome extesnsion for practising Pomodoro Technique

Pomodoro Technique™ is a simple time management using kitchen timer set to 25 minutes for uninterrupted working and then again to 5 minutes of rest.

 * click to activate 25 minute work timer
 * then take a 5 minute break
 * timer sets itself for the 25 minutes again
 * To stop the timer, click the tomato again.

More about Pomodoro Technique™ at http://www.pomodorotechnique.com/
